metadata.inclusion:
O2 Smart Box is mainly controlled from within O2 Smart Box application for smartphones. 
In section Add new device in our application, customer selects type of device and application activates inclusion mode at the gateway
metadata.exclusion:
O2 Smart Box is mainly controlled from within O2 Smart Box application for smartphones. 
In detail of every Z-Wave device, customer can find option to "Unpair device". When he selects this option, gateway enters exclusion mode and instruction how to exclude this device is shown in application (e.g. Click the pairing button three times within one second)
metadata.reset:
Select the Factory Reset item in the Advanced drop-down menu in WebUI.
Select the Factory Reset item in settings section in O2 Smart Box application
